_xResult.title: So Many Ways Button-up by EUG fashion - DR0463CA
_xResult.shortdesc: Custom made ruffled dress with button closure
_xResult.longdesc:
We love this custom made button-up for the winter season. This handcrafted piece is made out of cashmere and features long-sleeves, which makes it perfect for colder seasons. This would be the classiest piece to transition from fall to winter in—wear a pair of boots with this to a pumpkin patch and you’ll be the best-dressed there. You can wear this made to measure button-up open, making it more of a cardigan, or fully buttoned (with or without a belt) for a perfect dress.

 

Have fun with EUG's custom made designer clothing! For custom made requests regarding sizing, let the designer know using the button below.
